column1: Q: How do I reset my student portal password?
A: Visit the ICT center or use the 'Forgot Password' link on the portal login page.
Q: What is the resumption date for the next semester?
A: Resumption is scheduled for September 10th
column2: but check the official bulletin for updates.

column1: Q: Who do I contact for hall maintenance issues?
A: Report via ResoBridge or directly to the Hall Porters.
Q: How do I check my course registration status?
A: Log into the student portal
column2: click on “Course Registration” to see the summary.

column1: Q: What is the school dress code policy?
A: Students must be corporately dressed Monday to Friday. No casual wear allowed during lectures.
